snippet: Isner claimed his second Auckland Open title with a 7-6 (4) 7-6 (7) victory over Lu Yen-Hsun in a tight final at the Australian Open warm-up event.
abstract: John Isner defeats Lu Yen-Hsun to win his second Auckland Open tennis title.
lead_paragraph: Isner claimed his second Auckland Open title with a 7-6 (4) 7-6 (7) victory over Lu Yen-Hsun in a tight final at the Australian Open warm-up event.
